file_summary: This CSS file integrates and extends Bootstrap v5.3.6, serving as the core stylesheet for a web application, likely a 'petclinic' system based on the comments. It meticulously defines a comprehensive set of CSS custom properties for global styling, encompassing a broad color palette, typography settings, border styles, and shadow effects. The stylesheet supports both light and dark themes, dynamically adjusting color schemes based on the `data-bs-theme` attribute. Beyond these foundational variables, it provides extensive default and utility styles for standard HTML elements (body, headings, lists, tables, forms) and a wide array of Bootstrap components. This includes responsive grid layouts (containers, rows, columns), flexible box utilities, spacing, sizing, display, position, and visibility controls. Furthermore, it supplies styling for interactive UI elements such as buttons, various navigation types (tabs, pills, navbars), cards, alerts, progress bars, list groups, toasts, modals, tooltips, popovers, and carousels. The file also incorporates custom application-specific styles, overriding or complementing Bootstrap's defaults to achieve a unique visual identity, including specific adjustments for custom fonts, table headers, splash screens, and error pages, along with several defined animations.
